* Main chatbot class. Contains the logic of the chatbot.
* This enum represents the various types of commands available.
LIST, MARK, UNMARK, TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT, DELETE, UNKNOWN, BYE, FIND
* This exception covers commands that do not have enough arguments.
* This exception covers commands that are not recognised.
* Represents the storage of the drew.Drew. It contains the methods to save and load files.
* Contains the file path that the storage will read and write from.
* Saves the task list into a txt file, with a standard format.
* @param list TaskList object containing the tasks.
* @return Boolean value indicating whether the save was successful.
System.out.println("Save error: User does not have the correct privilege.");
* Loads the task list from a txt file.
* @return ArrayList that contains the list of tasks read.
* Converts the input string into a task object.
* @param input Encoded string that contains saved task details.
* @return Task object that corressponds to the input.
* @throws IllegalArgumentException when input arguments are invalid and cannot be read.
public Task parseSave(String input) throws IllegalArgumentException, DateTimeParseException {
//Removes whitespace from save string. Whitespace was used to increase readability of save txt file.

* This class represents the task list structure.
* Constructor for creating an empty task list;
* Constructor for creating a task list from an existing list.
* This class represents the Deadline task.
* Returns the type, status and description of the Deadline task.
* Converts the task into string format for the save file.
* This class represents the Event task.
* Stores the event start date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format.
* Stores the event end date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format.
public Event(String description, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) {
* Returns the type, status and description of the Event task.
return String.format("[E]%s (from: %s to: %s)", super.toStatusString(), this.startDate, this.endDate);
* Converts the task into string format for the save file.
return String.format("E | %s | %s | %s | %s\n", status, super.toString(), this.startDate, this.endDate);
return (isDone ? "X" : " "); // mark done task with X
* This class represents the Todo task.
* Returns the type, status and description of the todo object.
* Converts the task into string format for the save file.
* This class handles the interpretation and execution of user input.

public Command checkCommandIdentity(String input) throws UnknownCommandException,
